trans-unit.source: You must enter a username!
This username already exists!
The username must not contain any spaces!
trans-unit.target: 用户名不能包含有空格!

trans-unit.source: Confirm Password:
You have to enter the same password twice!
trans-unit.target: 两次输入的密码不一致!

trans-unit.source: The password must be at least 6 characters long!
You must enter a password!
You must choose a usergroup!
You must enter a name!
You must enter a first name!
You must enter a last name!
You must enter a address!
You must enter a telephone number!
You must enter a fax number!
You must enter a mobile!
This mobile is already in use!
The entered mobile is invalid!
trans-unit.target: 请输入正确的手机号码!

trans-unit.source: You must enter an e-mail address!
This e-mail address is already in use!
The entered e-mail address is invalid!
trans-unit.target: 请填入正确的邮件地址!

trans-unit.source: You must enter a title!
You must enter a zip!
You must enter a city name!
You must enter experience!
You must enter skills!
You must enter a job!
You must enter a country!
You must enter a web addess!
You must enter a company name!
Delete current image!
The image is too large!
The uploaded file is not an image!

trans-unit.source: The image could not be uploaded!
The image could not be deleted!
Delete Current User?
The User was successfully deleted!
Current Password:
Please enter your current password!
The entered password was not equal to your current password!
Resend activation mail to this e-mail:
Resend activation mail to the following User:
trans-unit.target: 给下列用户重新发送激活邮件!

trans-unit.source: A new activation mail was sent to your e-mail address.
You have to wait for admin activation!
Please enter the e-mail address you have registered with!
trans-unit.target: 请输入注册时填写的邮箱!

trans-unit.source: The entered e-mail address has not yet been registered or has already been activated!
Enter the letters displayed in the picture:
Please enter the letters displayed in the picture!
The entered letters were not correct, please try again!
trans-unit.target: 验证码输入错误，请重新输入!

trans-unit.source: Register
Save
You have been successfully registered.
Your profile has been successfully updated. You‘ll be redirected back in a few seconds.
trans-unit.target: 数据保存成功，正在返回!

trans-unit.source: To activate your account click the activation link in the e-mail we sent to you.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经给您发了激活邮件，请登录您的邮箱进行账户激活！

trans-unit.source: To activate your account, the administrator has to activate it.
trans-unit.target: 随后管理员将解锁激活您的账户！

trans-unit.source: To activate your account click the activation link in the e-mail we sent to you. Afterwards the administrator has to activation it.
trans-unit.target: 请点击我们发送给您的激活邮件激活账户！随后管理员将解锁激活您的账户。

trans-unit.source: To activate your account, the administrator has to activate it. Afterwards you have to click the activation link in the e-mail we sent to you.
trans-unit.target: 随后管理员将解锁激活您的账户！请点击我们发送给您的激活邮件激活账户！

trans-unit.source: Your account has been successfully activated.
trans-unit.target: 您的账户已经成功激活！

trans-unit.source: The users account has been successfully activated.
trans-unit.target: 客户的帐户已被成功解锁！

trans-unit.source: The activation of your account has been successfully rejected!
trans-unit.target: 您的账户激活请求被拒绝！

trans-unit.source: The activation of the customers account has been successfully rejected!
trans-unit.target: 客户的帐户激活请求已被拒绝！

trans-unit.source: Sorry, your activation link is not valid.
Sorry, this activation link is not valid or this account has already been activated.
trans-unit.target: 您的激活链接无效或者账户已经被激活！

trans-unit.source: Sorry, this activation link is not valid or your account has already been activated.
trans-unit.target: 您的激活链接无效或者账户已经被激活！

trans-unit.source: You can not edit your user data if you are not logged in.
trans-unit.target: 如果您没有登录，将不能编辑用户数据！

trans-unit.source: You can not edit the user data here!

trans-unit.target: 您的账户已经成功删除！
您的账户成功创建，现在管理员可以解除锁定了。
